bio:
Centered Text with Shadow
``` .center-text { font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; color: #333; text-align: center; box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); padding: 10px; background-color: white; border-radius: 10px; }
To succeed in the South African property market, avoiding these mistakes is essential. Investors should focus on thorough research, diversify their portfolios, and manage properties effectively.
```
